snippet: Fortis, the biggest gas and electricity distribution utility in Canada, agreed to buy UNS Energy Corporation, at a 31 percent premium over the stock’s closing price on Wednesday.
abstract: Fortis, the biggest gas and electricity distribution utility in Canada, agreed to buy UNS Energy Corporation, at a 31 percent premium over the stock’s closing price on Wednesday.

headline.main: Canadian Utility Buys UNS Energy of Arizona for $2.5 Billion
